title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
description: The Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 brand features a vibrant color palette including bright orange (f96800), alongside classic black (000000) and white (ffffff) as representations of its dynamic and action-packed gaming environment. These branding elements are designed to engage gamers and reflect the high-energy experience characteristic of this popular video game series. More detailed guidelines on its usage and design can be accessed through the official brand style guide available at the Call of Duty website.
